title: Discernus Experiment Definition (Framework Specification v3.1 Compatible)
description: Schema for defining a computational discourse analysis experiment compatible with Framework Specification v3.1.

name.description: A unique, descriptive name for the experiment.

description.description: A brief summary of the experiment's purpose.

version.description: Version number for the experiment supporting flexible versioning (e.g., v1.0, v2025.06.04, v1.2.3).

research_context.description: The broader research context or question.

citation_format_compliance.description: Framework Specification v3.1 requirement for citation format compliance.

components.description: All assets required to run the experiment (Framework Specification v3.1 compatible).

framework.description: Framework configuration (v3.1 structure with axes and anchors).

name.description: The name of the framework directory in `/frameworks`.

version.description: The specific version of the framework to use (flexible versioning).

registry_key.description: Framework registry key for unique identification.

citation_format.description: Required citation format: 'Discernus Framework: Name vX.Y (Author, Year)'

specification_version.description: Framework specification version (should be v3.1 or later).

name.description: A name for the corpus being used.

path.description: The relative path to the directory containing corpus texts.

pattern.description: A glob pattern to match text files within the corpus path.

models.description: A list of LLMs to use for the analysis.

name.description: The specific model name (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3-opus-20240229).
The name of the prompt template directory.

type.description: Prompt template type for Framework Specification v3.1 compatibility.

name.description: The name of the weighting scheme.

execution_settings.description: Settings that control the execution of the experiment.

enable_qa.description: Enable the 6-layer LLM Quality Assurance system.

enable_cache.description: Use cached results for identical analysis runs to save costs.

max_retries.description: Number of times to retry a failed API call.

citation_format_validation.description: Enforce citation format requirements from v3.1.

academic_standards.description: Framework Specification v3.1 academic standards and requirements.
